line_1: But mighty Love has often sworn
line_2: The pain they gave he will return,

line_1: But to call it good drink — is a lye, I'll be sworn,
line_2: For I ne'er was so dry since the hour I was born.

line_1: My heart is fix'd, my service deeply sworn,
line_2: How (by thy Father can that thought be borne,

line_1: For the Captain's as gallant a Man, I'll be sworn,
line_2: And as honest a Fellow as ever was born;
Though time the graceful form has worn

line_1: To soften facts so deeply sworn,
line_2: But would for his offences mourn;
